Well, I guess it's quite simple really
https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/blob/1f44b56310f0623f712a94df8fbeb25525bceb06/crates/bevy_app/src/schedule_runner.rs#L163-L164
This sleep slows it down. Enabling `bevy_log` enables this dependency on `bevy_app` with default features (which includes the `std` feature, and thus the `sleep`)
https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/blob/35cfef7cf2fb49ecb67cd367d737d59215f4ef05/crates/bevy_log/Cargo.toml#L17
Why this only affects Linux or what we should change is beyond me though
